Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: GenAI has provided more detailed responses on how I could improve my learning, whereas teachers responses are often much simpler.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: I feel like I don't fully trust GenAI feedback as it can provide different responses each time I submit something for it to evaluate. Whereas I find teachers feedback more trustworthy.

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: GenAI provides a broader and niche range of feedback to improve on whereas teachers usually comment on the same areas every time to improve on
